department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: black wool with buttons on each side at waist; open sides with stitch loops--five on PR leg, four on PL leg; red and pink lining; stitched front and back in pinks and purples with pairs of snakes, flowers and leaves
medium: Wool, silk, synthetic fibers (?), cotton; needlework
title: Man's ceremonial pants (Pantalón)
